I bought the checkered yellow and black, amazon essentials flannel shirt in 2019 and wore it every winter until January 2025 when I found a hole in the sleeve. I presume I tore it, because the rest of the shirt still looks ok. This is mid-weight flannel shirt for late fall and warmer winter days when the temperature is in low to mid 40s (Fahrenheit). The colors stayed bright and withstood many washings, allowing for the fact that I have multiple flannels and didn't wear and wash this shirt every week. For colder days, when the temperature is in the 30s, 20s I recommend heavier, "Canadian" style flannel, but for nicer winter days, this was my favorite flannel shirt, and I will be buying the exact same shirt again.
It’s a well made flannel that’s not to thick and not to thin. Perfect for spring and fall.
